name: MonsterDetector
0:
”Alexa, start monster detector”
”Check in the closet”
”Look in the hallway”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: monster detector
des:
This skill is meant for parents and anyone else that gets nervous at night without knowing what may be lurking in the shadows. Alexa is transformed into your own personal monster detector, scanning each area of your room that you request.

Sleep safe and sound tonight!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
